title: Dialer for Android Wear
summary: Dial any phone number and phone call directly on your Android Wear Watch.
developerAddress:
No. 51, YuanMingYuan Xi Road, Haidian Dist
Beijing, China
description: Dial and phone call any phone number directly on your Android Wear Watch.- Number pad to dial number on Watch- Option to automatically turn on Speaker- End phone call on the Watch- Recent number on the Watch with one touch to Call- Phone call even under screen lock
descriptionHTML:
Dial and phone call any phone number directly on your Android Wear Watch.

- Number pad to dial number on Watch
- Option to automatically turn on Speaker
- End phone call on the Watch
- Recent number on the Watch with one touch to Call
- Phone call even under screen lock
comments: Sometimes works sometimes doesn't Can't stay at the background. When it works, it's awesome; when it doesn't, it's really annoying. Hope will see an update to fix the problem very soon.
Won't work waist of money so far. Even after the newest update 1 out of 10 times dialing from the watch fails. I'm currently running with the g watch and a note 3 from Verizon
Does not work. Only worked the first time I downloaded it and that's it. I don't even write reviews but wanted to warn people.
Don't work at all waste of money
Great Works well on my LG game watch,  thanks
Handy on my lg g Watch Works well with my HTC one and LG G Watch, really useful for my customer support and sales work.
recentChanges: - Fix Android Wear Watch connect state
